name: Blip and Blop Balls Of Steel
description: Blip & Blop: Balls of Steel. What do the Smurfs, Super Mario Bros, Lara Croft and the Care Bears all have in common? They're all baddies in Blip & Blop! Although it is hard to believe, apparently these cute little friends are all actually pretty bad guys - and it's up to you to take care of them! Don't tell Papa Smurf you played this! (c) Loaded Studio. From 2002.
